full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTEN LA GZUNGS GZHUG 'BUL TSUL SHEL DKAR ME LONG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @019A *, ,(CES RTEN LA GZUNGS GZHUG 'BUL TSUL SHEL DKAR ME LONG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYI MDO RGYUD DANG 'PHAGS YUL GYI PAn GRUB KYI GZHUNG LAS RTEN LA DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I RING BSREL DANG GZUGS SNGAGS 'GA' ZHIG GZHUG PAR BSHAD PA LAS GZUNGS ZHUG 'BUL TSUL RGYAS PAR BSHAD PA MA MTHON KYANG BOD KYI BLA MA MANG POS MDZAD PA'I YIG CHA SNA TSOGS 'DUG CING, KHYAD PAR PAn CHEN CHOS KYI RGYAL POS MDZAD PA'I GZUNGS 'BUL NOR BU'I 'PHRENG BA DANG, RGYAL DBANG MCHOG GIS MDZAD PA'I GZUNGS 'BUL 'KHRUL SPONG NYIN BYED GNYIS LEGS PAR BSHAD PA'I MCHOG TU SNANG NA'ANG, SNGA MA HA CAN BSDUS GRAGS PA DANG, PHYI MA RGYAS DRAGS PAS BLO DMAN DAG GIS GO DKA' BAR 'DUG PAS` GO BDE LA RGYAS BSDUS 'TSAM PA ZHIG GYIS ZHES DON GNYER CAN 'GA' ZHIG GIS BSKUL BA LTAR, MKHAS DANG GRUB PA'I DBANG PHYUG RJE PHA BOD KHA PA 'JAM DBYANGS GRAGS PA'I LEGS BSHAD DANG, GZHAN YANG YIG CHA DU MA DANG, RANG GI PHYAG LEN MTHONG BRGYUD RNAMS KYIS BRGYAN TE YAB SRAS KYI LEGS BSHAD GNYIS KYI ZUR BRGYAN DANG ZHABS TOGS SU DMIGS TE, YUL BYANG PHYOGS KYI MTHAR SKYES PA'I BCOL CHUNG GYI NA BA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN GYIS 'JAM DBYANGS GONG MA'I RGYAL KHAM KYI BOD CHOS LHA KHANG DU GRAGS PAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI SMON LAM RIN CHEN NO, 'DI KYANG SEMS CAN THAMS CAD LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
author_simple: NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN,
